summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the levy and collection of a new assessment or re-assessment to pay the cost and expense of and for the improvement of Hanford Street from Utah Street to 1st Avenue South; 1st Avenue South, from Hanford Street to Spokane Avenue; and Spokane Avenue, from 1st Avenue South to 9th Avenue South; as specified and provided for in Ordinance No. 11949, and providing payment therefor.
